buildTarget.description: Specifies the build target to use for the unit test build in the format `project:target[:configuration]`

tsconfig.description: The path to the TypeScript configuration file, relative to the workspace root

vitestConfig.description: Specifies the configuration file for vitest. If a string is provided, it will be used as the path. If `true`, search for default config. If `false`, no external config will be used

browsers.description: Specifies the browsers to use for test execution. When not specified, tests are run in a Node.js environment using jsdom

browserViewport.description: Specifies the browser viewport dimensions for browser-based tests in the format `widthxheight`

include.description: Specifies glob patterns of files to include for testing, relative to the project root

exclude.description: Specifies glob patterns of files to exclude from testing, relative to the project root

filter.description: Specifies a regular expression pattern to match against test suite and test names

watch.description: Enables watch mode, which re-runs tests when source files change

debug.description: Enables debugging mode for tests, allowing the use of the Node Inspector

ui.description: Enables the Vitest UI for interactive test execution. This option is ignored in CI environments

coverageInclude.description: Specifies glob patterns of files to include in the coverage report

coverageExclude.description: Specifies glob patterns of files to exclude from the coverage report

coverageReporters.description: Specifies the reporters to use for coverage results

perFile.description: When true, thresholds are enforced for each file individually

coverageThresholds.description: Specifies minimum coverage thresholds that must be met

statements.description: The high and low watermarks for statements coverage. [low, high]

branches.description: The high and low watermarks for branches coverage. [low, high]

functions.description: The high and low watermarks for functions coverage. [low, high]

lines.description: The high and low watermarks for lines coverage. [low, high]

coverageWatermarks.description: Specifies coverage watermarks for the HTML reporter

reporters.description: Specifies the reporters to use during test execution

outputFile.description: Specifies a file path for the test report, applying only to the first reporter

setupFiles.description: A list of paths to global setup files that are executed before the test files

progress.description: Shows build progress information in the console

target.description: Environment target(s) (e.g. es2017, chrome58, firefox57, safari11, edge16, node10, ie9, opera45, esnext)

conditions.description: Custom conditions to include during resolution

listTests.description: Lists all discovered test files and exits the process without building or executing the tests.

keepBuiltFiles.description: Keep the temporary folder the tests are built into & log its path
